§ 151712. Annual report As soon as practicable after the end of each fiscal year, the corporation shall submit a report to Congress on the activities of the corporation during the prior fiscal year, including a complete statement of its receipts, expenditures, and investments. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1407.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)

The word “proceedings” is omitted for consistency in the revised title.
